title: Not On the Same Team
description: A new NPR podcast delves into a world where the NRA is viewed as too soft on guns and where a new network of more extreme pro-gun groups is on the rise. We hear a preview of NPR's "No Compromise" podcast.
copyright: Copyright 2016-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
